name: realtime-streams-examples
description: Interactive split-screen code viewer showcasing Trigger.dev Realtime Streams v2 patterns

stories.title: Project setup with split-screen shell
acceptance: shadcn/ui initialized with button, card, tabs

stories.title: Code panel renders Shiki-highlighted code with line numbers
acceptance: Use the official Trigger.dark theme by trigger.dev to highlight code
Each line shows line number on left
File tabs switch between task.ts, streams.ts, actions.ts
Code is readable and properly formatted

stories.title: Click UI element highlights corresponding code lines
acceptance: code-mappings.ts maps IDs to file + line ranges
Clicking element sets highlight in context

stories.title: Progress tracking Trigger.dev task streams updates
acceptance: processDataTask loops and writes progress updates
Each update includes current, total, message

stories.title: Progress demo UI shows realtime updates from task
acceptance: Start Task button triggers task via server action
Clicking Start highlights trigger code, progress highlights stream code

stories.title: Code panel auto-switches tabs when highlighting different file
acceptance: Setting highlight to different file switches active tab
Tab switch is immediate (no animation needed)

stories.title: Smooth scroll and highlight animations
acceptance: Highlight has subtle pulse animation on appear
